long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dealing with raw Blockchain addresses is a pain. The long strings of unrelated characters are impossible to memorize and make users prone to mistakes & susceptible to fraud.

This plugin allows you to use short, friendly and personalized aliases instead of the bulky Blockchain addresses. It's like using domain names instead of IPs.

To find out more about the CryptoAlias naming service, please visit: cryptoalias.io
